title: Trade a player within Payroll Forecast Utility without selecting him first
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
AND user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
AND "Add Player" button is visible
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a modal 
AND selecting a player in the Player dropdown that already appears in the Forecast Utility should pre-populate the modal with the player's information
AND user should not be able to select a new player
BUT user should be able to edit the salary information
AND "Add/Trade Player" button should be disabled until all required fields have been entered
AND cancel button should always be available, and when clicked should dismiss the modal without making any changes to the Payroll Report
AND when "Add/Trade Player" is clicked, the player and the information entered for him, should be added to both the CBT and LRD version of the current report for the Org selected in the modal, with "Traded from ORG" in the manually changed column
AND player should appear greyed out when viewing the Org that the player originated from with the text "Traded to ORG" in the manually changed column in View mode

title: LRD adds player not in the system to payroll forecast utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Payroll Forecast Utility screen
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to enter text in the "Player" field in the Add/Trade Player modal
AND the utility should still allow for the selection of existing players
AND Text should NOT be treated as a hyperlink
BUT Player names that exist in the system should continue to appear as a hyperlink

title: LRD user adds player not in the system to details of cash tx for payroll forecast utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
AND user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Cash Considerations Portion of the Forecast Utility
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to enter text in the "Players" field in the modal, and still allow for the selection of existing players
AND text should be comma separated just as the players are, but NOT treated as a hyperlink
BUT Player names should continue to appear as a hyperlink

title: User sees cash tx from Trades and Waiver Claim Assignments on Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Cash Transactions Table on Payroll Forecast Utility 
AND user has selected an Org and Year
AND one or more Trades or Waiver claim assignments exist that impact selected org's payroll or CBT calc for the selected year
custom_expected:
THEN the table should automatically be populated with any Cash Considerations from trades or waiver claim assignments that impact selected Org's Payroll or CBT calculations for selected Year
AND logic should match ebis1 with the exception of the changes detailed with the new CBA captured in the story #129837555
AND "From" Org should be mapped to the "Payor" in the Cash Considerations table
AND "To" Org should be mapped to the "Payee" in the Cash Considerations table
AND The Players included in the trade should be listed in the "Players" section
AND If there is a "Player to be named" then that text should also appear in the Players section of the Cash Considerations table
AND The dollar amount of the Cash Consideration should be reflected accurately

title: LRD receives error generating new Payroll Report for time period for which no saved roster exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
AND user has navigated to Payroll Report Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects "New"
AND user selects a value for "Save As" for which no saved roster exists for the year selected
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "{year} {Save As} value Rosters have not yet been saved." 
AND "Back" should be the only option available on the error

title: User sees cash tx from Trades and Waiver Claim Assignments on CBT Report Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Payroll Report Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Cash Transactions Table on Payroll Report Utility 
AND user has selected an Org and Year
AND one or more Trades or Waiver claim assignments exist that impact selected org's payroll or CBT calc for the selected "As Of" date
custom_expected:
THEN the table should automatically be populated with any Cash Considerations from trades or waiver claim assignments that impact selected Org's Payroll or CBT calculations for selected Year
AND logic should match ebis1 with the exception of the changes detailed with the new CBA captured in the story #129837555
AND "From" Org should be mapped to the "Payor" in the Cash Considerations table
AND "To" Org should be mapped to the "Payee" in the Cash Considerations table
AND The Players included in the trade should be listed in the "Players" section
AND If there is a "Player to be named" then that text should also appear in the Players section of the Cash Considerations table
AND The dollar amount of the Cash Consideration should be reflected accurately

title: Receive error if salary entered on MJC exceeds player's tender amount
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to create a Major Contract for a Professional Player 
AND selected player has a tender amount for the corresponding year of the MJC
AND Major or Minor League Salary on the MJC exceeds the tender amount
custom_steps: WHEN user updates contract status (On Submit rules are checked)
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "<Major> <and> <Minor> league salary amounts exceed this playerâ€™s tender amount."
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the point of entry
AND clicking "Override" should proceed with contract submission

title: Receive error if signing player that was Unconditionally Released under certain conditions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to create a Major Contract for a Professional Player 
AND selected player was previously Unconditionally Released by the Signing Org 
AND this player's UR was between Aug 31st of the previous year and start of the current season
AND current date is before May 15th
custom_steps: WHEN user updates contract status (On Submit rules are checked)
custom_expected:
THEN system should show error "This player was conditionally released by the signing org between August 31st of the previous year and the start of the current season. This Player cannot sign a MJ contract for the same Club until May 15th."
AND clicking "Back" should return user to entry point

title: Updates made on Approve of MJ Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a MJC exists for a player
AND MJC is in Pending Approval Status
custom_steps: WHEN the MJC is moved to Approved
custom_expected:
THEN system should set the LRD Verified Flag for all Payroll records for the current contract
AND system should update the Earned Date for the Signing Bonus Payment schedules to the current date

title: Verify contract should not be Terminated or Expired on Approve
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an MJC exists for a player
AND MJC is in Pending Approval status
custom_steps: WHEN MJC is moved to Approved status
custom_expected:
THEN system should check to see if there are any transactions with a datestamp after the contract signing date and before the current date which would expire or terminate the contract
AND If yes, and the transaction found is a release transaction , the contract's state should be moved to "Terminated"
BUT If yes, and the transaction found is not a release transaction, the contract's state should be moved to "Expired"

title: User does NOT see checkbox on Approvals Widget for LRD verification flag  Approvals item
custom_preconds:
GIVEN LRD Verification Required Approvals items do not need to be approved or rejected from the Approvals Clipboard
AND LRD user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN an LRD Verification Required flag Approvals item has been generated
AND LRD user navigates to Approvals widget
custom_expected: THEN Approvals item should not display a checkbox in the Approvals widget

title: Payments Tab Notification - calculated values changed for manually modified payment
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user in the permission group: LRD - Contracts - Admin is logged in
custom_steps: When the system updates any value for a payment that has been manually modified on the payments tab
custom_expected:
THEN LRD user should receive a notification stating that a manually modified value has been changed
AND the notification's description should read: "Payment Tracking - Overwrote manually modified payments"
AND  notification description should be a hyperlink to the affected Contract

title: Payments Tab Notification - if payment source disappears in contract update for a manually modified payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user in the permission group: LRD - Contracts - Admin is logged in 
AND a contract exists containing a Payment Source for which there exists manually modified payments
custom_steps: WHEN changes are made to a contract that entirely remove the Payment Source
custom_expected:
THEN LRD user should receive a notification
AND  description should read: "Payment Tracking - No longer calculating a payment which had manually modified values"
AND description should be a hyperlink to the affected Contract
